reviewText: I,am such a fan of his gospel music and hope to collect them all. I really have never been a fan of gospel,until I heard the Gaithers. I love music like the Rolling Stones,Conway Twitty and so on. Once my husband turned the channel by mistake and we heard them sing and now were hooked. The performers are from every walk of life and some had a lot of troubles. Bill G. brought them through their hard times and they love him dearly. They have a lot of laughs and tears. Great viewing.

reviewText: We love the Gaithers and have somany of their DVDs and this one isa great addition to our collection.The music is wonderful and I sohighly recommend this DVD to everyoneand if you like Gospel music, youneed this DVD.
summary: A DVD to help you feel good!!!

reviewText: I love this tape! Heartwarming music that is wonderful to play as the Thanksgiving feast is cooking! The songs are classic and the Christian artists will brighten your heart with this DVD collection of old gospel favorites. Very happy with this purchase!
summary: GREAT GOSPEL MUSIC FOR THE HOLIDAYS!

reviewText: Another great Gaither Homecoming DVD.  I loved all of the music.  I loved the testimonies of the Homecoming friends about the things they the Lord has blessed them with.  It was good to see them sitting around a Thanksgiving table sharing their faith and their thankfulness to God for His many blessings.  More people should do it.

reviewText: The out did themselves on this video and truly has much for each to be thankful for.  Will be sharing the video with others.

reviewText: Nice DVD. Something to listen to when you want to just lay back and take it in. Good music and a lot of thanksgiving. I do recommend it to those who like Gaither music. If you have never purchased a Gaither DVD before, then I recommend "I do Believe," "Singing in my Soul," or "Rocky Mountain Homecoming." Those would be better to get acquainted with the music. "I Do Believe" is just outstanding music by the Gaither Vocal Band; "Singing in my Soul" is a lively group singing-type DVD, and the latter was done in Colorado, the singing is good, and scenery is outstanding. There are other too, but those three came to mind.Mickey Thorne
Title: N/A
